New Records: India defended the smallest total in T20I history, with 119 being the lowest target that Pakistan failed to chase
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 3-14 and snuffed out Pakistan's hopes

Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma mentioned that his side got away with a big win, and that they were 15-20 runs short in their batting performance
Babar Azam spoke about Pakistan's batting approach, saying they left too much to do at the end and had too many dot balls
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Bumrah's performance, saying he's going from strength to strength and is a genius with the ball
Babar Azam said Pakistan will rue their batting approach massively and that they slipped up massively on the biggest stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd was superb, with India fans cheering and giving the team a lot of energy
